titles.title: I’ve Got a Wedding Garment On

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come everyone who’s thirsty come and drink All without money come and buy and eat Come to the table freely spread Living water living bread{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So far away and lost in sin and shame I had no hope until You called my name I’m Your beloved I’m Your own You are my life You are my home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’ve got a wedding garment on I’m fully justified in the Son I have no merit of my own Christ is my righteousness alone I’ve got a wedding garment on (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lift up a song, beloved of the Lord Winter has past, the rains have come and gone Arise, be dressed in readiness What a hope that we confess{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’ve got a wedding garment on I’m fully justified in the Son I have no merit of my own Christ is my righteousness alone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’ve got a wedding garment on (2x) I have no merit of my own Christ is my righteousness alone I’ve got a wedding garment on{/lang-eng}
